Add soy sauce and sesame seeds. 6. Serve over cooked rice, garnished with green onion.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Asian">6b314b979755021069a3b6fce053af78</cuisine> <diet>bca1c6979711021069a3b6fce053af90</diet> <effort display_value="Easy">fae0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Tofu (300g, extra firm), Bell Pepper (1)</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Dinner">ca8516df9751021069a3b6fce053afdf</meal_type> <name>Tofu Stir Fry</name> <nutrition>Calories: 350, Protein: 20g, Fat: 15g, Carbs: 35g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1.
